name: T.A.I.R.
description:
T.A.I.R. is a short game where you as a robot have to complete a quality control test, where you need to overcome several obstacles involving movement skill as well as problem solving to prove yourself capable of real world application.

Good luck, 489.

____________________________________________________

Game was made in 6 days for Weekly Game Jam 265 in the Godot game engine.

Please report any bugs or issues you might find as well as if the MacOS build works since it's untested. 

Thank you for playing!
